body: Chris, I think it has to to with the gendaymtx.exe. First when i run the simulation I got this error: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/-a-FzCyHE-A1Hg4eXnjPoWZ354lecSF5xly-P9ULpp4KgMv8krrqYII4jrVwnKZ9lc0OZ6z0NGl2XKeJSvRwntjfyJ8sjG2c/v2.JPG)Saying that it couldn't download the gendaymtx.exe file. So I manually downloaded this file and put it in my appdata/roaming/ladybug/ directory. Then it seemed to work, it showed the command prompt that it generated the sky etc and that window disapeared after couple of seconds etc. but then when I run the simulation I still get these results: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/-a-FzCyHE-B2YEPU15*qAk6TUplsSgAF1CVhT7oL9nPmgYr9GWFIwLXS*XPJ622BOVn4pZzdog2e4QLs3lpminGGBLMNRg48/v1.jpg)This is your exact defenition I didn't modify anything. Could you upload the gendaymtx.exe? Or how did you bypass the first error I had, that it couldn't download the gendaymtx.exe? Thanks!
